Saxmundham Mobile Library Route 10

Contact us:

Manager: Helen Hudson and Peter Fiske

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
10A Wangford Mill Fields 1000 – 1015
10B Wangford Church 1020 – 1040
10C Wrentham Bonsey Gardens 1050 – 1110
10D Carlton Colville Rushmere Road 1130 – 1145
10E Carlton Colville The Bell PH 1150 – 1230
10F Barnby Fir Close 1400 – 1420
10G North Cove Orchardleigh 1425 – 1510
10H North Cove Pinewood Gardens 1515 – 1600

Calling every 4 weeks on Wednesdays:

2016: 27 January, 24 February, 23 March, 20 April, 18 May, 15 June, 13 July, 10 August, 7 September, 5 October, 2 November, 30 November, 28 December
